commandDescription: Merge back csv files into object translations. Please note that this merge will first delete all the fieldTranslation xml files in order to recreate them
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv files. Default: '%s'
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output object translations. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a objectTranslation dir in input. Example: MyObject-en_US
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
